DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate abnormal dopamine synthesis and connectivity according to the antipsychotic treatment response in schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Abnormal Dopamine Synthesis and Connectivity According to the Antipsychotic Treatment Response in Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of schizophrenia clinically stable state history of previous head injury, epileptic disorder, other medical comorbidity substance abuse/dependence
